It?s smallest wifi camera with app. Once your iPhone or Android phone configured with router Wi-Fi (Only 2.4GHz). Then you can on the App from anywhere in the world. Keep an eye on your home or office as a security camera

Upgraded Night Vision --The biggest feature of the WIFI Camera is upgraded night vision, use advanced IR LED lambs and 26FT night vision distance, allows you to clearly see what is happening in low light even total darkness, and the IR lights are not visible when. So you can know whether someone breaks into your home or company even if the lights is off.

Enhanced Motion Detection Technology -- T9 camera with the upgraded intelligent motion detection, you can set the sensor sensitivity manually. Once a motion is detected, the small camera will send alarm notification with images to your phone. You can log into the App to see what's going on in real time and never worry about missing something important

Never Stop Video -- WIFI tiny Camera There is no built-in battery, you just need to connect the mobile power supply, or USB socket, you can achieve remote monitoring.camera also supports loop to ensure it can continuously. When a memory card is full,the newest file will overwrite a oldest file. You will never miss the important thing you want to know. You can use it to the growth of your pets and children.

Compact tiny size: Tiny and portable size will not attract any unexpected attention, which is also easy to set up and use. 2.Easy to place anywhere: it can be placed with the base on the table or shelf , or taped to the ceiling or other locations. 3.Comes with 128G TF card: Supports 24 hour loop video working, you can easily check the playback in the app. 4.Share with multiple users: A camera can share with multiple users needs, more safer and more convenient. 5.WIFI Remote watching : Wifi connection for multiple users to watch wherever you are.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HowKow MINI Camera is compact and portable, captures 1080P real-time footage and meets all your security needs in multiple locations. Wireless spy camera is an new device. On the outside, it is your normal multifunctional digital, but on the inside, it is packed with something else. The hidden camera is equipped with of invisible infrared lights. This allows you to your chosen room even in the dark. It also has a very sensitive light sensor that automatically turns on when the room is dark. It is a lot different from the night vision that you have to turn on manually.

HowKow 1080P Cloud Mini WiFi Home Security Hidden Camera Camera WIFI connection steps: 1. First connect the power to the camera, then turn on the camera, press the reset button on the camera for 5 seconds to restart the camera. 2. Open the downloaded APP 3. Click the Add button in the upper right corner. 4. Click on the first one to add a camera. 5. Enter your 2.4GHz WiFi and password. When your mobile phone is connected to 2.4G WiFi, it will automatically pop up. If it doesn't pop out, you can click the "..." at the back to select WiFi, and then return to the APP after selecting WiFi. Note that the camera only supports 2.4G WiFi. Then click Next. 6. Click the "..." behind the blank box, and then jump to the WiFi setting page of the mobile phone, select the camera hotspot "ACC.../BCC...", then return to the APP, and then click Next. 7. At this time, the camera will connect to the WiFi from the east to the west, and the connection will be completed, and it will display completed. After clicking Finish, it will automatically go to the next step, and then you can set the camera. This completes the WIFI connection.

Package Included: 1 × camera 1 × USB cable 1 × User Manual 1.Night vision: night vision features provide uninterrupted even in dark rooms. Compact tiny size: Tiny and portable size will not attract any unexpected attention, which is also easy to set up and use. 2.Easy to place anywhere: it can be placed with the base on the table or shelf , or taped to the ceiling or other locations. 3.Comes with 128G TF card: Supports 24 hour loop video working, you can easily check the playback in the app. 4.Share with multiple users: A camera can share with multiple users needs, more safer and more convenient. 5.WIFI Remote watching : Wifi connection for multiple users to watch wherever you are.

The camera has three working modes: The working modes are as follows: 1. Connectable to WiFi: After maintaining WiFi connection, you can view its information in real time on your mobile phone (the camera WiFi connection manual has detailed operation steps). 2. The second is to connect to the AP contact: this method is to open the camera reset first, then open the mobile phone WiFi page, connect the camera hotspot "DG......", and then directly click the AP to view the single phone in the mobile APP information. 3. The third is to insert the SD card: After inserting the SD card into the card slot, when you connect to WiFi and do not view it on the phone, or when the WiFi is not connected, the information will be automatically stored in the SD card and a loop cover will be made.

Motion Detection Snapshot Built-in sensors pick up movement within the camera’s field of view and trigger App alert message and snapshot on App. Night Vision Equipped with infrared lights, which allow you clearly to see details even in a dark environment. Whether at day or night, you know exactly who's entering your house or office. Remote View You can remotely view the video once the spy camera is connected to a WiFi network.You can also remotely playback, download or delete the video files by App.

128G TF card + Playback check on app Please connect the camera on app first for once, then start TF card.The TF card Work files can be checked on app or PC (via a card reader).The TF card file format is MKV, the mobile phone working file format is MP4. 1080P HD Camera Please connect the camera on app first for once, then start TF card. The TF card work files can be checked on app or PC (via a card reader). The TF card file format is MKV, the mobile phone file format is MP4. Operating multiple devices at the same time Four Hidden WiFi Wireless Security Cameras can be displayed at the same time, which is super convenient. You will get more views on one screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save yourself time & money - don’t purchase
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure how this product even had good reviews. This is a cheap excuse for equipment or a camera. Couldn’t get it to work at all, which didn’t surprise me once I opened the box and saw the “camera.” I feel like it’s all a ploy to download the app needed to operate it. My phone is probably hacked by now. Does not work, and is garbage. Amazon should stop trying to sell this to customers. Bad business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a neat little Cammy-cam!
reviews.reviewText: Seriously cool and handy device!¬ arrived undamaged and on time.¬ it's just a smidge larger than a quarter, so, easy af to hide¬ easy enough to set up & access after¬ image quality is fairly decent¬ very little lag while access by wifi¬ only downside is it has to be plugged in at all times to work...so either get it it's own dedicated power supply or keep it real close to an outlet.All in all, this is a great device!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Has to be plugged into a power supply at all times to work
reviews.reviewText: Tried ,tried and tried to get this camera to work, never ended up working , Had to install a App & it gave me alot of Annoying Ads & it still never connected the camera after hrs of trying to get it to work while plugged in it still didn't. Definitely a China App / product Definitely won't be purchasing this again, Returned it for a refund today Not Happy with this product -1/10 it's just my opinion someone else might feel differently but Never Again on my End that's for Sure and the directions were so small I had to use my Phone Camera to read it, I'm in my 40s and I'm Far from Blind !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars You definitely get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: The item description and the fact that they can't distinguish between an SD card and a micro SD card in their answers to customer questions should be enough to tell you that this item is not good.First, the slot for the micro SD card is not good. It consistently does not lock in the card. So, while I was recording hours of video thinking it would save to the card, it in fact saved it to the local device. That might not sound so bad, until you realize you cannot transfer that data to the micro SD card. That means you can only use the app for video playback.That itself wouldn't be the worst thing in the world, but the app playback is absolutely garbage. You cannot time scroll through the video at all. So, if you have 20 minutes of video, but need to see only the last 10 minutes, you have to wait 10 minutes of real time to get to the pertinent parts.There are also serious problems with maintaining a connection to the camera. You can tell it to record video via the app, but then, if you put your phone to sleep, it stops recording. The procedure here is to tell it to record, homescreen so the app is in the background, and then put your phone to sleep.Despite it being a useless item for most of its purposes, I gave it 2 stars because it does have motion detection (flimsy as it is), and it does actually take photos and pictures. But look elsewhere for mobility of data.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The camera had a decent picture. It came through over the app fairly clear. Connecting the mobile app to the camera was confusing the directions were not very precise in word for word and step for step. The camera name and what was in the directions didn’t match up, in addition to , the directions for locating the correct ID or camera was not clear as to where it would be found . Also wi fi and cellular instructions were no where near what was printed and were possibly for a different model. The biggest disappointment was for the sd card that is in the description for the camera that said was included with the camera purchase is not correct. The sd card was not included in the package delivered . For the price the camera itself is ok. Also, the power for the camera is not reliable it gets hot and shuts off . You get what pay for. Dont count on it for a reliable source. For fun it’s just ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For $20 this is great in a pinch
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to monitor my 3D printers from afar. Gonna buy more to add to my security at my shop. Very small. Easy setup. App is decent.1. Downloaded the app from Google Play.2. Connected my phone to the wifi broadcast from the camera.3. Inserted a micro SD and plugged into an empty USB slot with power.4. Formatted the SD inserted in the camera, no PC needed.5. Named it and put a password on it. Super easy if you've done any kind of setup for cameras before.I had expected the camera quality to be awful and very short range but instead I'm able to use one camera to watch both printers at the same time. For the price you can't beat it You just have to plan ahead to have a power supply. You could also Daisy chain this with a power block so that if the power goes out in your building you still have a recording camera. One big plus is the ability to turn off the light that so you can't tell that it's recording. Very stealthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy!
reviews.reviewText: Camera does not work. Corresponding APP does not work. Camera has to stay plugged in at all times; not wireless. Beware...do not waste your money. It's a scam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Camera
reviews.reviewText: Definitely the smallest surveillance camera I've ever seen. Very easy setup, for the most part. The smartphone app needs a lot of work, or at least an update. Some configuration screens on the app appear with Chinese characters so you just have to play with the setting to find the result you want. Tried, to no avail, to make it visible in another app. Yeah, it's a sweet little camera but don't forget to also order a powerbank. Would have easily given it 5-stars but I'm just not happy with the App.
